name: src/index.js
initialize
description: Stargate.initialize waits the cordova deviceready if runs in hybrid env

params.name: configuration.DEVICE_READY_TIMEOUT
params.description: how much to wait the deviceready event in ms

name: getVersion
description: Get the semantic version of stargate library

name: isInitialized
description: Returns true if the deviceready event has arrived

name: isHybrid
description:
Check if stargate is running in hybrid environment: 
in order:check the protocol, check cookie if any, localStorage if any

name: addListener
description: Register a listener for a series of events. Callable after initialize

params.name: fn
params.description: the function to call when the event occurs

name: removeListener
description: Remove a listener for a series of events

params.name: fn
params.description: the function to call when the event occurs

name: getManifest
description: get Manifest in the hybrid app

unknown.tagValue: {promise} - in success case fullfilled with Object

return.description: in success case fullfilled with Object

name: getWebappStartUrl
getWebappOrigin
description:
getWebappOrigin
return the online service domain string or empty string before initialization

params.name: url
params.description: an http url to load in the webview

name: goToLocalIndex
description:
goToLocalIndex
redirect the webview to the local index.html

name: goToWebIndex
description:
goToWebIndex
redirect the webview to the online webapp

name: __deinit__
description: just for testing purpose deinitialize stargate

name: src/modules/Connection.js
hostReachable
description:
Host reachable make a simple HEAD request 
to location.hostname
with a param to disable the cache

name: src/modules/Decorators.js

params.name: param
params.description: the require param or function. the function should return a boolean

params.name: context
params.description: the optional this-context. default to null

params.name: type
params.description: error raise an error, warn, info, debug write the message in console

name: src/modules/EventBus.js

params.name: eventType
params.description: if not exists it defines a new one

params.name: func
params.description: the function to call when the event is triggered

params.name: context
params.description: the 'this' applied to the function. default null

params.name: eventType
params.description: the eventType to trigger. if not exists nothing happens

params.name: func
params.description: the reference of the function to remove from the list of function

name: src/modules/Facebook.js
src/modules/File.js

params.name: url
params.description: the path to load see cordova.file.*

params.name: data
params.description: the string to write into the file

params.name: indexPath
params.description: the path to the file to read

params.name: indexPath
params.description: the path to the file to read

params.name: dirpath
params.description: the directory entry to remove recursively

params.name: _onProgress
params.description: the callback called with the percentage of unzip progress

params.name: url
params.description: the URL of the resource to download

params.name: filepath
params.description: a directory entry type object where to save the file

params.name: saveAsName
params.description: the name with the resource will be saved

params.name: _onProgress
params.description: a progress callback function filled with the percentage from 0 to 100

params.name: size
params.description: The size in bytes for example 5*1024*1024 == 5MB

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Array>} - returns an array of Object files

return.description: returns an array of Object files

name: write
description: write a file in the specified path

params.name: entries
params.description: an array of Entry type object

name: src/modules/Game.js
Game
initialize
description: Init must be called after the 'deviceready' event

name: download
description: download the game and unzip it

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<boolean|FileError|Number>} - true if all has gone good, 403 if unathorized, FileError in case can write in the folder

params.name: gameObject
params.description: The gameObject with the url of the html5game's zip

params.name: callbacks.onProgress
params.description: a progress function filled with the percentage

return.description: true if all has gone good, 403 if unathorized, FileError in case can write in the folder

params.name: gameID
params.description: the game path in gamesDir where to look for. Note:the game is launched in the same webview

name: _getIndexHtmlById
description: Returns an Array of entries that match /index\.html$/i should be only one in the game directory

params.name: dom
params.description: the document where to inject scripts

params.name: sources
params.description: the src tag string or array of strings

params.name: gameID
params.description: the game id to delete on filesystem

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Array>} - Returns an array of metainfo gameObject

return.description: Returns an array of metainfo gameObject

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<String>} - The promise will be filled with the gameover html {String}

return.description: The promise will be filled with the gameover html {String}

name: removeAll
description: removeAll delete all games and recreate the games folder

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<String|FileTransferError>} where string is the cdvfile:// path

params.name: info.url
params.description: the url with the [HSIZE] and [WSIZE] in it

return.description: where string is the cdvfile:// path

name: getBundleGameObjects
description:
getBundleObjects

make the jsonpRequests to get the gameObjects.
This method is called only if configuration key "bundle_games" is set with an array of gameIDs

name: needsUpdate
description:
needsUpdate
checks if there's or not a new version for the game(it makes a call to the api)

name: src/modules/Logger.js
Logger

params.name: tag
params.description: a tag to identify a log group. it will be prepended to any log function

name: setLevel
description: Set the minimum level for the logger

name: src/modules/Utils.js
Iterator

params.name: array
params.description: the array you want to transform in iterator

name: queryfy
description: A function to compose query string

params.name: params
params.description: a key value object: will be append to <api>?key=value&key2=value2

name: dequeryfy
description: A function to dequerify query string
examples:
var url = "http://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/comments?postId=1
var obj = dequerify(url); //obj is {"postId":"1"}

unknown.tagValue: {Object} the object with key-value pairs, empty if no querystring is present

return.description: the object with key-value pairs, empty if no querystring is present

name: extend
description: extend: this function merge two objects in a new one with the properties of both

unknown.tagValue: {Object} a brand new object results of the merging

return.description: a brand new object results of the merging

name: src/stargate.conf.js
